VoiceDir15.789BF: Struggling a little, but keeping it together.
Line15.789BF: I need a place to focus... keep her voice at bay.
VoiceDir9.789BF: Trails off with a pained grunt. She is hearing the voice of a demon (Andariel) in her head.
Line9.789BF: One of these nomads could help us reach it. They know the land better than... ugh.
Line5.6D03F: Just rumors, mostly. The people here speak of a sorcerer who lives in a grand palace, beyond the endless sandstorm.
